issue.title: [java] converter csv/json <=> Arrow file format for Integration tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-367](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-367). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We need to be able to read an Arrow file and write it to CSV/JSON (and back)
We don't need to be able to read arbitrary csv/json but just the files that we have generated ourselves.
We will have a similar tool in C++
